item.title: Trump Names His Former Defense Attorney as Acting Librarian of Congress
item.description: Follow-up from the firing of Librarian of Congress Carla Hayden, DOGE cuts threaten tribal libraries, and more.

item.title: This Poetry Collection Soothed My Frazzled Nerves
item.description: When you need to disrupt the spiral and train your brain on spare but vivid imagery, turn to this poetry collection by a groundbreaking poet.
